entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
